summary: When Scooby tries to make it big in Hollywood with little success, the rest of the gang try to convince him to return to his normal Saturday morning cartoon.
cast: Michael Bell|Edie Lehmann Boddicker|Paul DeKorte|Ginny McSwain|Pat Fraley|Don Messick|Joan Gerber|Michael Redman|Debbie Hall|Marilyn Schreffler|Stan Jones|Patricia Stevens|Casey Kasem|Rip Taylor|Heather North|Robert Tebow|Frank Welker
keywords: 1970s|los angeles california|california|animal character name in title|scooby doo character
title: Scooby-Doo Goes Hollywood
